mapper.insert: insert into t_order (oid, uid, recv_name, recv_phone, recv_province, recv_city, recv_area, recv_address, price, order_time, pay_time, status, created_user, created_time) values (#{oid}, #{uid}, #{recvName}, #{recvPhone}, #{recvProvince}, #{recvCity}, #{recvArea}, #{recvAddress}, #{price}, #{orderTime}, #{payTime}, #{status}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime})

insert into t_order_item (id, oid, pid, title, image, price, num, created_user, created_time) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.oid}, #{item.pid}, #{item.title}, #{item.image}, #{item.price}, #{item.num}, #{item.createdUser}, #{item.createdTime})
